TopicTitle: Can I make KSP reload a plugin DLL without restarting the whole game?

Articles.Content: Hi everybody. I'm new to KSP plugin development, currently I'm trying to figure out how I should organize my develop/test/fix cycle. More specifically, I've just created a hello world dll, KSP loaded it, now I'm going to extend it. Should I relaunch the game each time to test the plugin?

6 hours ago, olegst90 said:

Should I relaunch the game each time to test the plugin?

I'd say: Yes. Unless you use a special framework like ReloadableMonoBehaviour.

In my experience, replacing a plugin DLL in a running game will lead to all sorts of weird crashes.
